user.description: Create a sensor that calculates runtime for a watering zone, given calculated ETo and associated zone calibration data.

data_description.eto_entity_id: Name of the entity holding the calculated ETo value.
data_description.rain_entity_id: Name of the entity holding the accumulated rainfall over last 24h.
data_description.throughput_mm_h: Volume of water in mm/h that the zone can output.
data_description.scale: Percentage by which to scale the raw runtime calculations for the zone.
data_description.max_mins: Maximum runtime for the zone in minutes.
